name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send to Telegram for Google Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send to Telegram for Google Chrome, with your own key and token.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** IT WORKS (UPDATED: 2024-08-14) **

This extension sends website content directly to your Telegram Bot using the official API, without involving any third-party servers. Source code can be found at : https://github.com/phguo/Send-to-Telegram-Chrome-Extension.

Getting Start:

0. Install "Send to Telegram" from Chrome Web Store.
1. Create a Telegram Bot following https://core.telegram.org/bots#6-botfather and get your bot <API token>.
2. **Send any message to the bot created, in the Telegram APP.**
3. Get your <User ID>  (value of 'id' in the response) by visiting `https://api.telegram.org/bot<API token>/getUpdates`.
4. Fill your <API token> and <User ID> in the extension setting page. 
5. If everything is working correctly, the settings page and your bot will display '"Send to Telegram" configured successfully!'.

(The icon was created by Picons on Flaticon - https://www.flaticon.com)
